welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Siloam Springs! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and scenic natural beauty, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Smith Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at XNA serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springdale Municipal Airport serves domestic flights to and from various cities in the United States.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal (Drake Field) Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal (Drake Field) Airport provides services for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
